victim.name: Judge Helena Morrison
victim.murder_method: Poisoned with judicial robe care solution
victim.location: Her private chambers during court recess

client.name: David Chen
client.relationship_to_victim: Employee who recently discovered evidence tampering
client.apparent_motive: Revenge for being exposed as corrupt court reporter
why_appears_guilty: Had heated argument with judge about evidence transcription errors
Found in chambers with victim, claiming to deliver revised transcripts
His transcription device contained deleted files from the day of murder
Security footage shows him entering chambers with suspicious package
Known to have access to judicial cleaning supplies through custodial connections
why_actually_innocent: Was trying to expose a conspiracy involving evidence manipulation
Discovered judicial corruption ring and was about to report it
The 'deleted files' were backup copies of original, unaltered transcripts
Package contained evidence of transcript alterations, not poison
Real killers used his access to frame him for their evidence tampering cover-up

real_killer.name: Chief Clerk Margaret Winters
real_killer.true_motive: Judge Morrison discovered systematic evidence tampering operation
real_killer.murder_method: Poisoned robe care solution during routine chamber maintenance
framing_method: Manipulated security access logs to implicate David
Planted evidence on David's transcription equipment
Used knowledge of David's investigation to establish false motive
Leveraged administrative access to control evidence chain of custody
why_not_suspected: 20+ year trusted employee with administrative access
Was supposedly in evidence storage during murder with multiple witnesses
No apparent motive - appeared to have excellent working relationship with judge
Actively cooperating with investigation and handling evidence custody

setting.description: Busy urban courthouse handling high-profile criminal cases
setting.security_level: High-security with biometric access and surveillance
relevant_areas: Court reporter station - Where David worked
Evidence storage vault - Where tampering occurred
Administrative offices - Where conspiracy was coordinated
Security control room - Where logs were manipulated

key_themes: Evidence tampering and chain of custody

victory_conditions.prove_client_innocent: Show David was investigating corruption, not participating
victory_conditions.identify_real_killer: Expose Margaret as the evidence tampering coordinator
victory_conditions.establish_motive: Prove Margaret killed to cover up systematic evidence manipulation
victory_conditions.explain_method: Demonstrate how administrative access enabled both tampering and murder
